property.name: dfs.block.access.token.enable
property.description: If "true", access tokens are used as capabilities for accessing datanodes. If "false", no access tokens are checked on accessing datanodes.

property.name: dfs.namenode.kerberos.principal
property.description: Kerberos principal name for the NameNode

property.name: dfs.namenode.keytab.file
property.description: Combined keytab file containing the namenode service and host principals.

property.name: dfs.web.authentication.kerberos.principal
property.description: The HTTP Kerberos principal used by Hadoop-Auth in the HTTP endpoint. The HTTP Kerberos principal MUST start with 'HTTP/' per Kerberos HTTP SPNEGO specification.

property.name: dfs.web.authentication.kerberos.keytab
property.description: The Kerberos keytab file with the credentials for the HTTP Kerberos principal used by Hadoop-Auth in the HTTP endpoint.

property.name: dfs.web.authentication.kerberos.keytab
property.description: The Kerberos keytab file with the credentials for the HTTP Kerberos principal used by Hadoop-Auth in the HTTP endpoint.

property.name: dfs.datanode.kerberos.principal
property.description: The Kerberos principal that the DataNode runs as. "_HOST" is replaced by the real host name.

property.name: dfs.datanode.keytab.file
property.description: The filename of the keytab file for the DataNode.
